BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE PIST_LTC_REQ_TRN T SET T.STR_NAME_OF_HOD=?,T.STR_VERIFY_STATUS=?,T.DT_VERIFY_DATE=?,T.STR_REM_FOR_VERIFY=?,T.STR_STATUS=?,T.GNUM_ISVALID=?,T.GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID=? WHERE T.STR_REQ_APP_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_LTC_REQ_FAMILY_DTL SET STR_STATUS=? WHERE STR_REQ_APP_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_LTC_REQ_LEAVE_DTL SET STR_STATUS=? WHERE STR_REQ_APP_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PIST_LTC_REQ_FAMILY_DTL SET STR_STATUS=? WHERE STR_REQ_APP_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_LTC_REQ_LEAVE_DTL SET STR_STATUS=? WHERE STR_REQ_APP_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
